price: 难道你不知道安拉有天地的主权吗？除安拉之外，你们既没有任何保护者，又没有任何援助者。
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam taʿlam anna al-laha lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā lakum min dūni al-lahi min waliyyin walā naṣīrin
